src_original: bhagavānāha- evameva mahārāja bālo 'śrutavān pṛthagjanaścakṣuṣā rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā saumanasyasthānīyāni abhiniviśate /
tgt_original: 」佛言： 「大王！ 如是。 愚癡無識凡人，眼見色時心生憙樂，便起執著；
起執著已隨生顧戀，生顧戀已情懷染愛；

src_original: saṃrakto rāgajaṃ karmābhisaṃskaroti trividhaṃ kāyena,  caturvidhaṃ vācā,  [trividhaṃ manasā] /
tgt_original: 起染愛故隨貪、瞋、癡，發身、語、意造作諸業。

src_original: tacca karmābhisaṃskṛtamādita eva kṣīṇaṃ niruddhaṃ vigataṃ vipariṇataṃ na pūrvāṃ diśaṃ niśritya tiṣṭhati,  na dakṣiṇām,  na paścimām,  nottarām,  nordhvam,  nādhaḥ,  neha,
tgt_original: 然此諸業作已滅壞，此滅壞時曾不依止東方而住，亦不依止南、西、北方，四維上下，至命終時意識將滅，所作之業皆悉現前。

src_original: iti hi mahārāja caramavijñānenādhipatinā tena ca karmārambaṇena aupapattyaṃśikaṃ dvayapratyayaṃ prathamaṃ vijñānamutpadyate /  yadi vā nārakeṣu,  yadi vā tiryagyonau,  yadi vā yamaloke,
tgt_original: 「大王！ 前識滅已後識生時，或生人中，或生天上，或墮傍生、餓鬼、地獄。

src_original: tasya ca prathamavijñānasya aupapattyaṃśikasya samanantaraniruddhasya anantaraṃ sabhāgā cittasaṃtatiḥ pravartate,  yatra vipākasya (Bcp 225)
tgt_original: 後識生時，無間生起彼同類心，相續流轉，分明領受所感異熟。

src_original: tatra yaścaramavijñānasya nirodhaḥ,  tatra cyutiriti saṃkhyā bhavati,  yaḥ prathamavijñānasya prādurbhāvaḥ,  tatropapattiriti /  iti mahārāja na kaściddharmo 'smāllokāt paralokaṃ gacchati,
tgt_original: 曾無有法能從此世轉至後世，然有死生業果可得。
